comments_since_last_sample.body: Use moss carpets with lights underneath to light up the area :)

That was genuinly a very convincing ad spot well done

I love the height of the walls in the cavern you made. I think it would be cool if the plant life had height too! Maybe some taller (and optionally skinnier?) trees, or vines/glow berries hanging down parts of the cliff (using string to limit their growth) or even some nether plant vines if you want a splash of blue or red somewhere

The amethyst glowstone tinted glass effect is INCREDIBLE
Glazed Terracotta blocks might look cool in the water elevator! Either pink arrow ones to show you go up, or another color gradient!
The path looks so good and the blocks is something you wouldn’t think of using
Melon blocks also work great in green gradients!
Great Video Iskall, keep up the good work. I myself have started uploading videos to YouTube. Hopefully I get to where you are one day!!
